Data: Welcome to Eden Park for the second ODI. Australia have won the toss and are batting first. No changes for the visitors, Daniel Vettori is back for Jacob Oram and Ross Taylor has missed out
Bond to Watson, 1 wide and it's well wide of off stump, Billy Bowden calls it a wide and there's no doubt about that decision
Bond to Watson, no run left alone outside off at 140kph, no swing there for Bond
Bond to Watson, no run lovely ball, that one swings in quite prodigiously and Watson goes for an off-drive, the ball sails between bat and pad
Bond to Watson, 2 runs Watson's off the mark with a clip through midwicket, although it wasn't timed, he was trying to drive that straighter
Bond to Watson, no run an lbw appeal here, the ball swings in and hits Watson in line, but high up on his thigh and definitely would have sailed over the top
Bond to Watson, no run left alone outside off, Watson keen to have a bit of a look at Bond at this stage
Bond to Watson, no run oh, nearly got him! Movement in again from Bond, and some bounce, Watson plays off the back foot and very nearly chops it back into his off stump, the ball bounc
Southee to Haddin, no run Haddin faces his first ball and it's off the meat of the bat, a good strong straight drive that is well fielded by Franklin at mid-on
Southee to Haddin, 1 run Southee strays onto the pads, Haddin clips a single out to the right of Franklin at mid-on
Southee to Watson, no run straight, on off stump, Watson drives to mid-off
Southee to Watson, no run no swing here from Southee, just probing on off stump and Watson defends
Southee to Watson, 1 run Watson clips a single off his pads, down to fine leg
Southee to Haddin, no run Haddin looks for a big drive through off, but can't beat the man at cover
Bond to Watson, no run full and wide of off at 143kph, Watson drives straight to cover, he'd be annoyed at not getting that one through the infield
Bond to Watson, no run drives to extra cover
Bond to Watson, 1 run clipped away to fine leg, a bit too straight from Bond
Bond to Haddin, no run left alone outside off
Bond to Haddin, 1 run quick running from Haddin, he nudges it back past the bowler and takes off immediately for a well-judged single
Bond to Watson, no run good line outside off, no swing though, and Watson angles the bat and defends towards gully
Southee to Haddin, no run a bit of outswing from Southee, full and wide of off, Haddin tries for a drive but misses
Southee to Haddin, 1 run on the pads, this one doesn't swing and Haddin clips a single to midwicket
Southee to Watson, FOUR runs lovely straight drive to the boundary, it was on the stumps and Watson looked like he was playing a simple forward defensive but timed it so well that it r
Southee to Watson, no run oops, nearly a costly mix-up, Watson wants a single to midwicket but Haddin doesn't, and Watson turns back and gets home with a dive
Southee to Watson, no run nudged away to off
Southee to Watson, no run good line on off, Watson defends
Bond to Haddin, no run left alone outside off
Bond to Haddin, no run good bounce here from Bond, he's working hard, and Haddin lets it go through to Hopkins
Bond to Haddin, 1 run Haddin punches a drive wide of Vettori at mid-off and they get through for a single
Bond to Watson, 1 run fine fielding from Guptill at cover point, Watson tries to get a square drive through point and Guptill moves quickly across to keep it to a single
Bond to Haddin, no run swing and a miss! Bond nibbles one away outside off, Haddin has a big windy whoosh and lucky for him it misses his edge
Bond to Haddin, no run slower ball, defended by Haddin
Southee to Watson, FOUR runs a thickish edge away through the vacant third slip area and third man can't quite get across to cut it off
Southee to Watson, 1 run slower ball at 119kph, on the pads and Watson picks it, working a single to midwicket
Southee to Haddin, no run Haddin misses again, he's looking a little scratchy, tries to guide this one wide of the slips but there's more bounce than he expected
Southee to Haddin, no run 141kph, Southee beats Haddin again, lovely bowling and Haddin's attempted drive doesn't connect
Southee to Haddin, no run howzat? Immediate denial from Rudi Koertzen. Pitching on off and jagging back, Haddin gets hit on the flap of the pad and Hawk-Eye shows that going over the t
Southee to Haddin, no run left alone outside off
Bond to Watson, no run beaten again, Watson was trying to late cut and Bond's extra bounce did him
Bond to Watson, FOUR runs cracking cover drive this time, Bond gets just a little too full and Watson connects with this one, finding the gap wide of short cover
Bond to Watson, no run no shot offered outside off
Bond to Watson, no run angling in to Watson, who gets forward with bat and pad close together to defend
Bond to Watson, no run slower ball, left alone outside off
Bond to Watson, 1 run angled bat from Watson, he guides a single to third man
Southee to Watson, 1 run another slower delivery, Watson works a single away behind square leg
Southee to Haddin, 1 run good bounce again, Haddin gets under it and cuts deliberately in the air to third man, it falls safely short of the fielder
Southee to Watson, no run super bounce again, it really surprises Watson as he tries a late cut, Hopkins takes it at shoulder height
Southee to Watson, 1 run quick single, good running as Watson's forward defensive runs away behind the stumps and Haddin calls him through
Southee to Haddin, no run on the stumps this time, Haddin tries to go through leg but doesn't connect properly
Southee to Haddin, no run good line on off, Haddin defends
Bond to Watson, no run 131kph, just a touch slower, but wide of off and Watson leaves it alone
Bond to Watson, no run angles in towards off stump, pushed back to mid-off
Bond to Watson, no run moving in to Watson again, defended to leg
Bond to Watson, SIX runs and finally Watson gets one that he wants to go after, 131kph again from Bond, fullish on the stumps, and Watson lifts it high and long, over the bowler's head
Bond to Watson, 1 run a good-looking pull flies off the bat but straight to Ingram at deep midwicket
Bond to Haddin, 1 run on the hips, clipped away to midwicket
Southee to Haddin, no run Haddin tries to go on the attack, backing off and driving hard but straight to mid-off
Southee to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin gets hold of this one, advances and waits on a slightly slower ball before launching it over mid-on for a boundary
Southee to Haddin, no run that's a wild swing! Shorter and wider of off, Haddin threw the kitchen sink at that but it beats the bat
Southee to Haddin, no run nudged to leg for no run
Southee to Haddin, FOUR runs another boundary from Haddin, easy as you like he gives himself a little room and guides it over mid-off
Southee to Haddin, no run yorker, hits Haddin's foot as he backs away towards leg
Franklin to Watson, FOUR runs great shot! Just short enough and Watson pulls viciously through midwicket
Franklin to Watson, 1 run angled away to third man
Franklin to Haddin, 1 run Haddin tries for the drive down the ground again, but doesn't get hold of it and Vettori at mid-off gets across and knocks it down
Franklin to Watson, no run beaten, Watson tries to guide that wide of the keeper
Franklin to Watson, no run Watson goes for the cut and again Franklin beats the bat
Franklin to Watson, no run on the pads, Watson works it to backward square leg and can't get a run
Tuffey to Haddin, no run well-timed cover drive, but not so well-placed as it finds the fielder in the circle
Tuffey to Haddin, 1 run another one flies off the bat, they do get a single this time as the man at point knocks it down
Tuffey to Watson, no run 133kph, left alone outside off
Tuffey to Watson, 1 run Watson drives, there's a man at long-off now so it's just a single
Tuffey to Haddin, no run wonderful fielding from Brendon McCullum at short cover, he hurls himself to his right and stops Haddin's big drive
Tuffey to Haddin, SIX runs what a great shot! Outstanding strike from Haddin as he walks a couple of paces down the pitch and lifts this one from off stump over wide midwicket, he's g
Franklin to Watson, FOUR runs short and four. Poor ball, Franklin shouldn't be sending down leg-side bouncers at 129kph and Watson pulls it through square, easy as you like
Franklin to Watson, no run tries to dab that one wide of the keeper but can't connect
Franklin to Watson, 1 run driven uppishly towards mid-off, the man moves across to keep it to a single
Franklin to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin has decided his area is down the ground so he goes again, getting under it but doesn't quite time it and the ball lobs inside the boundary and is cut
Franklin to Haddin, no run crunched to point and Guptill makes another good stop, that one was travelling
Franklin to Haddin, no run slower ball, nudged away to point
Tuffey to Watson, 1 wide tight call there from Rudi Koertzen, Watson tries to lash Tuffey through point but misses and it is pretty much on the line that guides the umpires regarding
Tuffey to Watson, no run nudged towards leg
Tuffey to Watson, FOUR runs bad ball, on the hips and with fine leg up, Watson has no problem guiding that one away to the boundary
Tuffey to Watson, FOUR runs wide again, could have been called had Watson not found the middle of the bat, he's down on one knee to drive over cover, lovely stroke
Tuffey to Watson, OUT gone! Watson tries to go over midwicket but he hasn't timed that well enough. There's a man on the boundary, it's Martin Guptill, and he takes a safe catch.
Tuffey to Haddin, 3 runs nice deft placement from Haddin, he waits on this and guides it behind point, Bond running around from third man makes a diving save, impressive commitment fo
Tuffey to Ponting, no run Ponting's first ball is left alone outside off
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run drifts in and Haddin drives a single to long-on
Vettori to Ponting, no run tossed up on off, no real spin there and Ponting defends
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run just a hint of curve in, Ponting drives through cover
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run drifting in towards the leg stump, Haddin cautiously knocks another single to long-on
Vettori to Ponting, OUT oh Ricky, what was that? So much for getting his eye in, Ponting tries for a big slog over midwicket but gets a thick top edge that flies high and is taken by
Vettori to Haddin, no run driven towards mid-off
Tuffey to Clarke, no run a shout for Clarke first ball, Tuffey wanted the lbw but it was angled in and looked to be heading down leg side
Tuffey to Clarke, no run Clarke is forward this time to defend
Tuffey to Clarke, no run pushed away defensively
Tuffey to Clarke, no run slower ball, Clarke pushes to mid-on
Tuffey to Clarke, no run driven back down the pitch and Tuffey gets down quickly to make the save, keeps Clarke on strike and doesn't let him get off the mark
Tuffey to Clarke, no run nudged away to point to end a good over from Tuffey
Vettori to Haddin, no run left alone outside off, no spin there
Vettori to Haddin, no run drifting in, Haddin defends
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run punched away through point and the man in the deep collects
Vettori to Clarke, no run not much turn again, Clarke defends
Vettori to Clarke, no run pushed away to off
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run on the back foot, Clarke gets a single through point
Tuffey to Clarke, no run Clarke clips it into his pads, thinks about a quick single but doesn't go for it
Tuffey to Clarke, 1 run on the hip, Clarke works it away behind square leg
Tuffey to Haddin, 1 run pushed away through cover
Tuffey to Clarke, no run bat onto pad once again, and again there's no single there
Tuffey to Clarke, FOUR runs oh well played! Tuffey drops in short and well wide of off, somehow Clarke pulls it from out there down into the ground and through midwicket for a boundar
Tuffey to Clarke, no run forward to defend this time
Vettori to Haddin, SIX runs and Vettori goes for a maximum! Haddin uses his feet and launches Vettori back over his head for six, that really did look effortless
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run clipped away to mid-on
Vettori to Clarke, no run curving in to off stump, Clarke defends
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run drifts in again, worked through midwicket
Vettori to Haddin, SIX runs another one from Haddin, this time over long-on as he takes a couple of steps down the pitch, gets under it and thumps it down the ground
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run pushed away to the off side
Styris to Haddin, no run on the stumps immediately, clipped to midwicket
Styris to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin mixes it up by just opening the face of the bat and guiding this to the vacant third man area, Broom runs back from in the circle and collects it
Styris to Haddin, no run flicked to leg and Guptill is super quick, dives across from midwicket to make a save
Styris to Haddin, FOUR runs what impressive timing, Haddin drives in the air down the ground, and timed so well that Tuffey at long-on can't get across despite it being only a few met
Styris to Haddin, no run pushed away to leg
Styris to Haddin, 1 run good timing again, driven along the ground back past the bowler, this time Tuffey is fast enough to cut it off
Vettori to Haddin, no run ooh, almost a caught and bowled, Haddin looks for the big drive and checks his shot, it bounces just short of Vettori
Vettori to Haddin, no run guided to gully, can't beat the field
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run punched away to long-off for a single
Vettori to Clarke, no run wider of off, Clarke slashes at that without much footwork and finds the man at backward point
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run Clarke skips down the pitch this time and drives back past the bowler
Vettori to Haddin, no run curving in nicely, no real spin though and driven back to the bowler
Styris to Clarke, 1 run Styris is on target and Clarke drives to long-on
Styris to Haddin, no run 113kph, Haddin drives straight to McCullum at cover
Styris to Haddin, 1 wide strays down leg, no doubt about that one being called wide
Styris to Haddin, no run straight-bat defence from Haddin, that one was just outside off
Styris to Haddin, no run 130kph, a bit quicker and it's pushed back to the bowler
Styris to Haddin, no run opens the face but just finds the man at short third man
Styris to Haddin, no run on the back foot, Haddin drives to mid-on
Vettori to Clarke, no run Clarke looks to crunch that through cover but mistimes it
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run drifting in from around the wicket, driven down towards mid-on
Vettori to Haddin, OUT what a catch! Magnificent return take from Vettori! Haddin has positively laced that drive after taking a couple of steps down the pitch, it flew wide of Vettor
Vettori to White, no run White is forward to defend his first ball
Vettori to White, 1 run pushed away down towards long-off and White is off the mark
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run tossed up and it's cut away forward of point for a single
Bond to Clarke, no run drives to mid off
Bond to Clarke, no run edges on the bounce to slip, good save there
Bond to Clarke, no run plays and misses at a good one outside off
Bond to Clarke, OUT short and Clarke tries to pull, with both feet off the ground the ball lobbing to mid on for a simple catch
Bond to Hussey, no run leaves outside off, goodish pace at 148 kph
Bond to Hussey, no run short outside off, just inside the line so it's not a wide
Vettori to White, no run leaves one go outside off
Vettori to White, no run gets well forward in defence, playing it to cover point
Vettori to White, no run defends towards the off side again
Vettori to White, 1 run forces off the back foot out to deep cover point
Vettori to Hussey, no run forces off the back foot to mid off
Vettori to Hussey, no run comes forward in defence, another very tidy over NZ bowlers doing an excellent job here at the moment
Bond to White, no run defends to cover point
Bond to White, no run defends off the back foot, Bond appears to be a little bit extra into that ball
Bond to White, no run short of a length again, defends to point
Bond to White, no run defends again off the back foot
Bond to White, 1 run digs a very ball out towards deep extra cover, a single taken
Bond to Hussey, no run defends off the back foot to cover point
Vettori to White, no run clips a ball to mid wicket
Vettori to White, 1 run pushes gently to deep mid on, easy single taken
Vettori to Hussey, no run drives to cover
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run well flighted and drives it to long on
Vettori to White, no run drives to cover point
Vettori to White, no run pushes forward and is beaten between bat and pad, the keeper Hopkins whips the bails off and the TV replay is called for
Bond to Hussey, no run drives to mid off, finds the fielder there
Bond to Hussey, no run defends off the back foot to mid off, sharpish pace again at 148kph
Bond to Hussey, 2 runs leg side, worked off the pads and heads for long leg, Tuffey down there makes a mess of it and they come back for an extra run
Bond to Hussey, 1 wide short outside off, Rudi Koertzen says it's a wide and on replay it looks a poor call
Bond to Hussey, no run short, Hussey is surprised by the speed and bounce but manages to get it to ground
Bond to Hussey, no run drives off the inside half of the bat towards mid off
Bond to Hussey, 1 run drives to short cover and Brendan McCullum dives to his left and performs a brilliant piece of fielding..........not bad by a keeper without the gloves on!!!
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run driving to deep mid on, nicely played
Vettori to White, 1 run well flighted and White drives it to long off
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run works off the pads to deep mid wicket
Vettori to White, no run plays off the back foot to cover point
Vettori to White, 1 run shorter, forces off the back foot to the cover point sweeper
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run outside off and neatly cut out to deep point
Styris to Hussey, 1 run forces off the back foot to long off
Styris to White, no run back of a length and defends to the on side
Styris to White, 2 runs moves slightly to the off side, working the ball to long leg. Smart batting
Styris to White, 1 run goes to the leg side this time and it's aimed at his pads - worked to long leg for just a single this time
Styris to Hussey, no run forces off the back foot to cover point
Styris to Hussey, 1 run drives to mid off, single taken
Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs drives wide of mid off and it runs away to the fence, great placement there dissecting mid off and cover with precision
Vettori to Hussey, no run worked to mid wicket
Vettori to Hussey, no run pushes to point, finds the fielder
Vettori to Hussey, no run drives to mid off, good bowling this since giving up the boundary first ball
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run worked to a gap at square leg
Vettori to White, 1 run drives past the short cover and an easy single to long off
Styris to White, 1 run played to long on, easy single
Styris to Hussey, 1 run drives to long off, another pretty easy single
Styris to White, 1 run drives to long off, another handy single for Australia
Styris to Hussey, 1 run short, pulls with little effort to deep square leg
Styris to White, 1 run works off his pads to deep square leg, Franklin does well to keep it to a single
Styris to Hussey, 1 run punches off the back foot to long off
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run works out to deep square leg
Vettori to White, no run drives towards mid on, Vettori gets across and saves it with his foot
Vettori to White, 1 run drives out to deep cover, plenty of force in that shot
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run works to the leg side, finds the gap
Vettori to White, 1 run outside off and carved out to deep cover point, raising the 150 for the Aussies
Vettori to Hussey, no run forces off the back foot to cover point, ending Vettori's spell
Tuffey to White, FOUR runs full and hammers a drive back past the bowlers left hand, excellent timing
Tuffey to White, no run plays defensively to point
Tuffey to White, no run forces off the back foot to cover point
Tuffey to White, no run aims to drive to mid off, plays it a bit early and it ends up at mid on
Tuffey to White, 1 run forces off the back foot out to deep cover point
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run drops it into the off side, Guptill charges in from point and underarms the ball into the stumps - home safely enough, no referral called for
Southee to Hussey, no run defends off the back foot to backward point and Broom charges in and fields preventing a single
Southee to Hussey, no run straighter ball, worked to mid wicket finding the fielder
Southee to Hussey, no run drives to cover and Guptill does well moving to his left
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs works to deep square leg, finds a gap that allows them to grab a couple
Southee to Hussey, 1 wide short and tries to hook, a big shout for caught behind perhaps to con the umpire into not calling a wide, which Bowden does eventually call
Southee to Hussey, no run plays back in defence
Southee to Hussey, no run defends to point, time for some drinks at Eden Park with 15 overs left in the Aussie innings
Tuffey to White, 1 run driven to long off for an easy single
Tuffey to Hussey, FOUR runs works a leg side ball backward of square leg and it rolls past Bond going away for a boundary
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run advances and drives to long off
Tuffey to White, 2 runs short, pulls over mid wicket - only just as Guptill jumped high into the air and couldn't quite get a hand on it
Tuffey to White, SIX runs short and hooked it away flat and somehow for six! Good shot but I'd doubt if that would be six at any other venue in the world
Tuffey to White, no run comes forward and defends to the bowler
Southee to Hussey, no run straightish, drives towards the onside
Southee to Hussey, 1 run drives off a thick inside edge to deep square leg
Southee to White, no run works off his pads to mid wicket
Southee to White, 1 run drives out to deep cover point
Southee to Hussey, FOUR runs slower ball, short and pulls to deep square leg for another four
Southee to Hussey, 1 wide short down leg side, obvious wide
Southee to Hussey, no run struck on the pad -- well outside off
Styris to White, no run defends towards cover
Styris to White, 1 run drives into a gap at extra cover
Styris to Hussey, no run slower ball, plays to the bowler
Styris to Hussey, 1 run drives to long off, another easy single
Styris to White, no run moves to leg, the ball follows him and he punches it to mid wicket
Styris to White, no run drives to mid on, finding the fielder
Southee to Hopes, 1 run full and gets it away to short fine leg
Southee to Johnson, 1 run clips of the pads to deep mid wicket
Southee to Hopes, 1 run makes room to leg and drives to long on
Southee to Johnson, 1 run full, driven to long on, just a single
Southee to Hopes, 1 run full and chips to deep mid wicket, good bowling once again
Southee to Johnson, 1 run drives to long on for another single
Bond to Johnson, 1 run drives hard to long on, another single
Bond to Hopes, FOUR runs drives hard and gets an edge through the slip area to a fine 3rd man
Bond to Hopes, no run flashes and misses outside off,
Bond to Hopes, 1 run works to a gap at mid wicket
Bond to Johnson, 2 runs slogs to deep mid wicket and Broom runs in off the rope and it just falls short of him, however he may been a bit late in picking it up
Bond to Johnson, no run swings a misses outside off
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run cuts a short ball to deep cover point
Franklin to White, no run drives to mid off
Franklin to White, 1 run punches a drive to long off
Franklin to Hussey, no run slower ball yorker which he drives into the off side
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run chips a drive to long on
Franklin to White, 1 run drives to long off, another very tidy over there just 4 runs from it
Styris to White, 1 run makes room to leg and drives to deep mid off
Styris to Hussey, 1 run drives past Guptill at cover for a single
Styris to White, 1 run drives to long on another easy single, good tight bowling here though with nothing too short
Styris to Hussey, 1 run shortish, pulls to deep square leg
Styris to White, 1 run makes room to leg and drives to long off
Styris to Hussey, FOUR runs drives square of wicket, beating the diving point fielder - crashing into the boundary
Southee to Hopes, 1 run drives back at the bowler, it hits the stumps at the bowlers end
Southee to Johnson, 1 run swings hard at a full ball, driving to long on
Southee to Hopes, 1 run chips to deep square leg, again very full and hard to slog it away
Southee to Johnson, FOUR runs reverse sweeps to 3rd man, flying off the bat to the boundary
Southee to Johnson, 1 run chips a very full ball to mid wicket
Southee to Hopes, 1 run advances and drives to deep mid off, actually made it into a yorker
Tuffey to Hopes, FOUR runs makes room and drives hard through the covers - slightly slower ball there
Tuffey to Hopes, 1 run knee high full toss, drives in the air to long on
Tuffey to Johnson, 2 runs straight driven past the bowler, Guptill does well on the rope at straight hit and saves the boundary
Tuffey to Johnson, 1 run full and wide, drives to long off where Guptill features once again
Tuffey to Hopes, 1 run makes room to leg and glances to short fine leg, just the single, a yard or two either side of the fielder and is was a boundary
Tuffey to Johnson, OUT swings hard and misses, Hopkins fumbles, Hopes takes off and the keeper regathers and fires it to Tuffey who runs out Hopes - that's the innings
Some issues with the weather at Eden Park as we have had some rain -- there will be a slight delay to the start of the NZ run chase. It seems we will start at 4.30pm NZ time a delay of about
So the homeside needs 274 to win -- please rejoin us for further coverage of this match in around about half an hours time.
Bollinger to start the innings - no change to the target despite losing 15 minutes
Bollinger to McCullum, no run leaves alone outside off - 137 kph
Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs full and drives with great power to the cover point boundary much to the delight of 13,500 people in
Bollinger to McCullum, no run slashes at one outside off and misses
Bollinger to McCullum, no run leaves this one outside off
Bollinger to McCullum, no run defends off the back foot to point
Bollinger to McCullum, SIX runs square drives a full ball over backward point into the old terracing at Eden Park, great start for the Kiwis in this run chase
Harris to Ingram, no run drives hard to cover, good looking shot first up
Harris to Ingram, no run middle and leg, tries to work to leg but it ends up at mid on
Harris to Ingram, no run swings and misses at one outside off
Harris to Ingram, 1 run whips it off the pads to the deep in the leg side
Harris to McCullum, no run hit on the pad as he tries to work to leg, a good shout from the bowler who let that rip at 144kph
Harris to McCullum, no run gets one that jags into him, he takes the bottom hand off the bat in a back foot defensive shot
Bollinger to Ingram, no run thrashes at one outside off and misses, kept a bit low on the way to the keeper
Bollinger to Ingram, no run defends to the off side
Bollinger to Ingram, 1 run works into a gap at mid wicket for a single
Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs short and pulls it away through forward square leg - cracking shot
Bollinger to McCullum, no run goes back in defence to a good length ball
Bollinger to McCullum, SIX runs short and hooks it in the deep square leg construction site - McCullum seeing them very well early
Harris to Ingram, no run slightly slower ball, tries to turn to leg getting an inside edge onto his pad
Harris to Ingram, no run plays to mid on
Harris to Ingram, (no ball) played defensive - but it's a no ball, so we'll have a free hit
Harris to Ingram, no run short, leg side bumper which follows the batsman as he moves to leg
Harris to Ingram, no run plays back in defence to the bowler
Harris to Ingram, no run defends to the on-side
Harris to Ingram, no run drives towards mid on
Johnson to McCullum, no run plays and misses to one outside off, not a bad start for Johnson silencing the crowd
Johnson to McCullum, no run makes room and charges at the bowler, swinging and missing outside off
Johnson to McCullum, FOUR runs full and wide, he cracks a powerful drive through the covers to the boundary
Johnson to McCullum, no run defends to mid off
Johnson to McCullum, OUT tries to work to leg, getting an edge and Haddin dives to his right, in front of slip and hangs onto a blinder of a catch. The end of a brief but entertaining
Johnson to Guptill, no run drives a full ball to cover point
Harris to Ingram, no run tries to pull and it hit high on the pad
Harris to Ingram, no run worked off the stumps to mid wicket
Harris to Ingram, FOUR runs lofts over forward square leg, very wristy shot timed superbly
Harris to Ingram, no run ducks a bouncer that swing late after it passes the batsman
Harris to Ingram, 1 run plays a leg side ball to long leg
Harris to Guptill, no run plays off the back foot towards mid on
Johnson to Ingram, 1 run drives and edges a full ball to 3rd man, Harris dives and saves it on the line - clever fielding
Johnson to Guptill, no run leaves a short ball outside off
Johnson to Guptill, FOUR runs full and wide and it powered through the covers in fine style
Johnson to Guptill, no run defends off the back foot towards cover
Johnson to Guptill, no run defends off the back foot back to the bowler
Johnson to Guptill, no run defends into the covers
Harris to Ingram, 2 runs turns an off-side ball through forward of square leg
Harris to Ingram, FOUR runs clips off the pads fine, past the fielder who is up inside the circle, a poor ball which got what it deserved
Harris to Ingram, no run flips off the pads to short fine leg, finding Johnson this time
Harris to Broom, OUT an appeal first up and he is gone - caught on the crease at this one looked pretty good - dead line, height not an issue
Harris to Franklin, no run an anti-climax, leaves it alone outside off
Johnson to Guptill, no run drives nicely to extra cover - well fielded there by Clarke
Johnson to Guptill, no run goes back and tries to turn to leg, striking him on the pad
Johnson to Guptill, no run pushes at one outside off, an appeal for a catch behind but Haddin didn't appeal
Johnson to Guptill, no run leaves outside off
Johnson to Guptill, no run leaves outside off, nearly a wide
Johnson to Guptill, no run defends into the off side
Harris to Franklin, 1 run pushes to mid wicket, a reminder that Franklin is using a runner today
Harris to Guptill, no run defends to backward point
Harris to Guptill, no run defends off the back foot
Harris to Guptill, no run drives to extra cover, Clarke does the fielding
Harris to Guptill, 1 run works off the back foot to a gap at square leg
Harris to Franklin, 1 run plays off the back foot to 3rd man, Bollinger slides and saves down there
Johnson to Franklin, OUT tries to pull and he gets a glove down the leg side, Franklin walks and he is gone -- Kiwis in all sorts of bother as Franklin limps off
Johnson to Styris, 5 wide he does drop short, and Styris ducks, it beats Haddin and they get five wides!!!
Johnson to Styris, no run plays off the back foot to point
Johnson to Styris, no run plays back in defence to the off side
Johnson to Styris, FOUR runs full and wide and it gracefully thumped through the covers - right out of the meat of the bat
Johnson to Styris, no run defends off the back foot to mid off
Bollinger to Guptill, no run drives hard to Clarke at cover
Bollinger to Guptill, no run full and wide, square driven to point
Bollinger to Guptill, SIX runs full and driven with great power back over the bowlers head into the advertising hoarding, ripper of a shot
Bollinger to Guptill, 1 run drives through the covers
Bollinger to Styris, no run defends off the back foot to cover point
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run drives out to deep cover point
Johnson to Styris, 1 run digs out a wide ball to 3rd man
Johnson to Guptill, no run defends into the offside
Johnson to Guptill, no run plays back in defence towards cover point
Johnson to Guptill, 1 wide wide of the batsman and swinging further away
Johnson to Guptill, no run drives to mid off, firmly struck but finds the fielder
Johnson to Guptill, no run aims a big drive and misses outside off
Johnson to Guptill, no run comes forward to one that comes back into him slightly, good ball to end the over
Bollinger to Styris, no run drives off the back foot to point
Bollinger to Styris, FOUR runs wide and thrashes it behind point for a boundary, top shot from a widish ball
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run worked off the pads behind square leg
Bollinger to Guptill, no run comes forward in defence to cover
Bollinger to Guptill, no run wide again, slashes at it outside off and misses
Bollinger to Guptill, FOUR runs full and it is smashed through mid off, hit with immense power even if it there was minimal footwork
Watson to Styris, no run defends off the back foot towards mid off
Watson to Styris, 1 run drives out to deep cover point
Watson to Guptill, no run short and forces to point, Ponting there saves
Watson to Guptill, no run plays forward and defends to the bowler
Watson to Guptill, 1 run forces off the back foot into a gap at cover point
Watson to Styris, 1 run flicks off the pads to deep square leg
Hopes to Styris, 1 run turns off the stumps to backward square leg
Hopes to Guptill, 1 run gets a thick inside edge behind square leg to turn the strike over
Hopes to Styris, no run tries to turn to leg, hit on the pad but well and truly missing leg stump
Hopes to Styris, FOUR runs short and hammers a pull shot behind square leg as the rain stars to come down again
Hopes to Styris, no run defends to point as we have a sun shower here
Hopes to Styris, 1 run forces off the back foot to Ponting at cover point and they take a sharp single
Watson to Styris, no run defends off the back foot to mid wicket
Watson to Styris, 1 run drives to Ponting at point, they try for a single, Ponting aims and misses at the bowler's end, had he hit Styris was half a pitch short of his ground
Watson to Guptill, OUT plays back to one that moves away slightly, the edge is found and taken by Haddin - Guptil goneski!!!
Watson to Hopkins, 1 run drives confidently to deep cover point, nice way to get underway
Watson to Styris, 1 run clips off the toes to deep square leg
Watson to Hopkins, no run defends off the back foot to mid on
Hopes to Styris, no run drives to cover
Hopes to Styris, no run comes forward in defence
Hopes to Styris, 1 run drives and gets an inside edge, Johnson dives and saves it at short fine leg saving maybe three runs
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run drives out to deep cover point
Hopes to Styris, 1 run nicely driven to long off
Hopes to Hopkins, no run plays back to one which appears to cut back a bit, Haddin dives to his left and takes it, there is an appeal which is answered in the negative
Watson to Styris, 1 run works off about middle peg to deep square leg
Watson to Hopkins, 1 run drives to deep cover point, easy single for the NZ 'keeper
Watson to Styris, no run defends off the back foot to short mid wicket
Watson to Styris, no run defends off the back foot to the bowler
Watson to Styris, 1 wide short and leg side, tries to pull missing it and gets a wide
Watson to Styris, 1 run drives it with power to long on
Watson to Hopkins, FOUR runs guides a good length ball behind point to the bounhdary, played with a vey straight bat, top stroke to bring up the 100 for the homeside
Hopes to Styris, no run comes forward and plays to backward point
Hopes to Styris, 1 run drives back past the bowler towards long on
Hopes to Hopkins, no run plays to backward point
Hopes to Hopkins, no run comes forward in defence to play the ball to cover
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run comes forward and pushes a drive to deep cover point
Hopes to Styris, 1 run plays back and gets an inside edge to mid wicket - time for a single
Hauritz to Styris, no run chips a ball to mid wicket
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run drives to long on, easy single
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run drives off the back foot into a gap at cover point
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run drives to long off
Hauritz to Hopkins, no run drives to the bowler who fields well
Hopes to Styris, no run plays off the back foot to mid wicket
Hopes to Styris, 1 run drives to cover point, finding the gap there
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run plays off the back foot out to deep cover point
Hopes to Styris, 1 run comes forward and deftly works it to long on
Hopes to Hopkins, no run defends to mid wicket
Hopes to Hopkins, no run gets one that jags back, he inside edges into his body
Hauritz to Styris, no run drives to cover
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run plays to deep mid wicket for another single
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run comes forward and pushes it into a gap at point
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run outside off, drives square of the wicket
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run a bit of bounce and turn, played off the back foot to point
Hauritz to Styris, no run plays off the back foot to mid wicket
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run plays off the back foot to Ponting at point, who has a rare misfield
Hopes to Styris, no run played to mid wicket, Hussey fields well preventing a run
Hopes to Styris, 2 runs leg side, played to short fine leg and Johnson saves but has a unneccessary throw and misses, conceding an overthrow
Hopes to Styris, no run plays to Clarke at cover
Hopes to Styris, 1 run drives a very full ball down to long on
Hopes to Hopkins, no run plays back and slightly across one, hit on the pad but umpire Koertzen feels it was missing despite a whole hearted appeal from the bowler
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run advances and drives to long on
Hauritz to Hopkins, no run comes forward in defence towards cover
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run comes forward and pushes the ball to deep cover point
Hauritz to Styris, no run plays off the back foot to mid wicket
Hauritz to Styris, no run wide, tries to late cut and misses
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run drives to long on
Hopes to Styris, 2 runs plays to mid wicket, Hussey dives and can't gather, they scramble back for a couple
Hopes to Styris, no run forces off the back foot to cover
Hopes to Styris, 1 run plays off the back foot to long off
Hopes to Hopkins, FOUR runs slashes at one outside and it flies away behind point for a much needed boundary
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run works a ball on middle stump to deep square leg, thought of two but not on this time
Hopes to Styris, 1 run short and pulls to deep square leg, Harris saves on the rope and it is time for a drinks break
Hauritz to Styris, no run comes forward and defends to mid wicket
Hauritz to Styris, OUT same shot as the previous ball, but this time he hits it in the air and Ponting leaps up and takes a good catch - a vital wicket and the Kiwis chances take a bi
Hauritz to Vettori, no run comes forward and defends to the bowler
Hauritz to Vettori, no run well flighted and it is driven to mid off
Hauritz to Vettori, FOUR runs slog sweeps over mid wicket, good aggressive shot
Hauritz to Vettori, no run comes forward in defence
Bollinger to Hopkins, no run defends off the back foot to point
Bollinger to Hopkins, 2 runs short, pulls over square leg for a couple
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run plays off the back foot to cover point
Bollinger to Vettori, 2 runs goes well across to the off side and tries to glance, getting an edge onto his pads to long leg - did well to get away with that as he nearly glanced it o
Bollinger to Vettori, no run plays off the back foot to mid wicket
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run drives to long on to keep the strike for the next over
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run plays to deep mid wicket, easy single
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run plays off the back foot to deep square leg
Hauritz to Vettori, no run drives on the bounce to cover
Hauritz to Vettori, no run has a big swing at a well flighted ball, quite a good deal slower
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run pushes to square leg, finding the gap
Hauritz to Hopkins, 2 runs leg side and clipped off the pads, Bollinger does well on the rope saving a couple of runs
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run short and pulls it just over the head of the fielder at mid wicket
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run punches a drive to deep mid on
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run drives to long on, nicely played to the fielder in the deep
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run plays across one, getting a little edge onto his pad - the ball running away to the off side
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run shortish, pulls to deep square leg
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run drives out to deep point - 114 more needed from 15 overs
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run drives to long on for an easy single
Hauritz to Vettori, FOUR runs lofts over the bowlers head, beating Watson at long off who came around in a vain attempt to stop it
Hauritz to Vettori, SIX runs advances and lofts it over mid wicket, hit it flat and hard into the crowd - good attacking batting this
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run goes back and across, pushing into a gap at mid wicket
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run played off the back foot to mid wicket - great over for the Kiwis
Harris to Vettori, 1 wide not the best of starts, a leg side wide
Harris to Vettori, 1 run plays off the back foot to point
Harris to Hopkins, 1 run square drives to deep 3rd man
Harris to Vettori, 1 wide leg side wide as Vettori slightly distracts him by moving the off side
Harris to Vettori, 1 run worked off the pads to deep square leg
Harris to Hopkins, no run drives to mid off, finding Michael Clarke
Harris to Hopkins, FOUR runs drives off the edge, beating Watson who ran around from 3rd man
Harris to Hopkins, no run defends the last ball of a long over to cover
Watson to Vettori, 1 run tries to work to leg, getting a bit of pad on it
Watson to Hopkins, no run drives to backward point, fielded there by Ponting
Watson to Hopkins, no run plays off the back foot to point
Watson to Hopkins, OUT bumper, hooks at it getting a top to long leg where Bollinger holds onto a catch. Might have been a fraction high for the shot, but when you need 8 an over to w
Watson to Vettori, 1 run drives back past the bowler down to long on
Watson to Tuffey, 1 run pushes forward and drives to mid off
Harris to Tuffey, no run defends into the off side
Harris to Tuffey, no run defends off the back foot to mid wicket
Harris to Tuffey, 1 run works a length ball behind square leg
Harris to Vettori, FOUR runs moves to the off side and works to the deep square leg boundary - risky shot, he's got a tremendous eye and gets it away to the fence
Harris to Vettori, 1 run drives to long off
Harris to Tuffey, no run comes forward and defends to the bowler
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 leg bye tries to work to leg and gets a bit of bat onto it
Hauritz to Tuffey, 1 run shortish, pulls a quicker ball to deep backward square leg
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run plays a length ball that turns a fraction to deep mid wicket
Hauritz to Tuffey, 1 run slog sweeps along the ground to deep mid wicket
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run leg side, clips off the back foot to deep square leg
Hauritz to Tuffey, FOUR runs short, late cuts with power to the boundary, fantastic shot from Tuffey there - very smart batting
Watson to Vettori, 2 runs steps again to the off side and leg glances it
Watson to Vettori, 1 run worked to deep square leg, again moving to the off side to get into the right position
Watson to Tuffey, FOUR runs swings hard at a full ball and gets an inside edge past leg stump and the' keeper to the boundary
Watson to Tuffey, FOUR runs chips a ball behind square leg for four more to the short boundary
Watson to Tuffey, 1 run comes forward and gets an inside edge to mid wicket, Hussey dives but can't field the ball cleanly
Watson to Vettori, FOUR runs drives in the air behind point and it flies away for another four - the Kiwis are right in this, making the most of the short boundary in that over
Johnson to Tuffey, no run swing and misses at a wide half volley
Johnson to Tuffey, 2 runs edges towards slip, White knocks it down and they scramble a couple
Johnson to Tuffey, 1 run comes forward and defends to cover point, another single 54 off 51 needed for the Kiwis
Johnson to Vettori, 1 run moves to the off side and plays it to deep square leg, hard to bowl at - mind you a yorker on middle stump might sort that out...................
Bollinger to Vettori, FOUR runs gets across the crease and leg glances to the vacant long leg boundary
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run drives back past the bowler to long off
Bollinger to Bond, no run defends off the back foot to cover
Bollinger to Bond, no run defends off the back foot to the bowler
Bollinger to Bond, no run comes forward and defends to point
Bollinger to Bond, 1 run drives with some style out to deep cover point to keep the bowling
Johnson to Bond, no run plays forward and drives at a 149kph ball and misses
Johnson to Bond, no run tries to drive at a yorker that is wide of the off stump
Johnson to Bond, 1 wide down leg side, tries to work it to long leg and misses - wide given
Johnson to Bond, no run swings and misses outside off
Johnson to Bond, no run wide outside off, just inside the guide line that helps the umpire
Johnson to Bond, FOUR runs works off the pads and it flies away behind square leg, Bollinger does his best on the boundary but can't stop it
Johnson to Bond, no run drives at another very wide ball and misses outside off - again just inside the guideline for the wide call
Bollinger to Vettori, FOUR runs drives over the bowlers head and that brings up a wonderful 50 off just 34 balls, what a knock!
Bollinger to Vettori, no run moves to the off side and pushes to mid wicket, Clarke has a ping at the bowlers end and misses
Bollinger to Vettori, no run moves to leg this time, slashes and misses
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run moves to leg and lofts a ball to deep square leg, landing on the first bounce to Watson
Bollinger to Bond, 1 run drives with some power to deep cover point
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run moves to the off side and works it to deep square leg, thus keeping the strike - sensible stuff
Johnson to Vettori, SIX runs short outside off and he cuts it over the head of Bollinger at 3rd man - great shot and smart play trying to score at the shorter parts of the ground
Johnson to Vettori, 1 wide full and leg side, a shocker of a ball and another run for NZ
Johnson to Vettori, 1 run cuts to 3rd man again, this time along the ground for a single
Johnson to Bond, OUT very full and he plays inside it and he loses his stump -- well bowled by Johnson, at last a bowler goes full and straight and it has paid off
Johnson to Southee, no run flashes at a wide ball outside off and misses it
Johnson to Southee, no run defends off the back foot back to the bowler
Johnson to Southee, 1 run works to long leg - so Southee will have the strike
Harris to Southee, no run comes forward in defence, fielded by the bowler
Harris to Southee, no run plays back and is beaten outside off - good bowling
Harris to Southee, 1 run has a wild swing at a good length ball and gets an edge to 3rd man, bit of panic in that shot - but got away with it
Harris to Vettori, no run moves to leg and tries to hit a yorker, no contact
Harris to Vettori, no run another yorker, he makes room but misses again
Harris to Vettori, 1 run full again, he digs it out behind the stumps to keep the strike - ending an excellent over for the Aussies
Johnson to Vettori, FOUR runs makes room and drives a low full toss on middle stump through cover point, unbelievable shot!!!!
Johnson to Vettori, FOUR runs backs away to leg again and lofts it over mid off.......just and it runs away for another four!!!! Great stuff from the skipper!
Johnson to Vettori, no run moves to the off side and tries to flick a length ball that goes over the top of middle................gee that was close
Johnson to Vettori, no run makes room and hammers a drive to mid off, no chance of a run as he hit it far too well
Johnson to Vettori, 1 leg bye late inswinger, hits him on the pad but angling down leg
Johnson to Southee, 1 run edges on the bounce just short of slip, Haddin dives tries to catch it, White knocks it down and a single is scored
Harris to Southee, 1 run drives at a wide length ball, edging to 3rd man, did well there the lad. Now Vettori on strike with 13 off 11 balls required
Harris to Vettori, OUT steps to the off side and he tries to glance it, but misses and loses his off stump - Australia wins the game and levels the series at one apiece
These teams appear to be very well matched up and they will meet again on Tuesday at the lovely Seddon Park in Hamilton for the 3rd ODI. On behalf of the team this is Lawrie Colliver signing
What a finish - full credit to the Aussies for getting over the line, another great game of 50 over cricket in the battle for the Chappell Hadlee trophy. Smart bowling in the end from Harris
Australia won by 12 runs (D/L method)
Player of the match is Daniel Vettori, NZ
